duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, coordinate, and implement projects within the budget, timeline, and scope.
Manage multiple small/medium projects and coordinate all aspects of assigned projects.
Estimate scope of work and prepare strategic plans for project success.
Serve as the primary client liaison and actively manage client budgets, schedules, and programs.
Coordinate and communicate with the client on a routine basis and establish project process checklist and monitor progress.
Manage project staff, client expectations, and coordinate with consultants.
Initiate phase planning sessions and ensure that the project meets general firm goals, project design intent, standards, and quality assurance.
Obtain client requirements, communicate to project team, receive information from project team, and monitor efforts to incorporate requirements into the project.
Review project financial reports, including billing information, and assist in the development and maintenance of office standards.
Manage agency applications, interface, and approvals with the agencies having jurisdiction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Architecture from an accredited program (preferred but not required)
